meanings.sent1: I am repaying the loan I borrowed from my friend.
meanings.sent2: She is repaying her debt to the bank every month.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel is repaying the favor by sharing its nuts with the bird.
meanings.sent4: The sun repaying the earth with warmth and light every day.
meanings.sent5: The student is diligently repaying the money owed for the school trip.

meanings.definition: To make a return for (something done or given).
meanings.sent1: He is repaying the kindness shown to him by helping others.
meanings.sent2: The company is repaying the loyalty of its customers with special discounts.
meanings.sent3: The cat is repaying the love of its owner by purring contently in their lap.
meanings.sent4: The river repaying the land with fertile soil during the flood season.
meanings.sent5: The artist is repaying the support of the community by creating beautiful murals.
